Title: Entertaining Father Stone
Plot:
The world's most boring priest comes to stay, and he just won't go away. 


After his worst ever birthday party, Father Ted prays for deliverance from Father Stone, but a lightning strike wasn't what he expected.
GuestStars: Patrick Drury, Rynagh O'Grady, Arthur Mathews, Michael Redmond, David Carey, Kate Binchy, James Beswick, Joane Hall
